profile.headline: Distributed Systems & Backend Engineer
profile.summary: Distributed Systems & Backend Engineer specializing in Python, FastAPI, AWS, event-driven architectures, and LLM/AI workflows. Delivered scalable cloud-native, AI/LLM-enabled products for fast-evolving startups. Proven in zero-to-one builds, automation, and business-impact delivery. Passionate collaborator, product-focused builder, open to high-responsibility engineering roles.

experience.title: Co-Founder / Platform Engineer
experience.summary: Co-founded and led platform engineering, building distributed event-data pipelines with TypeScript/Node and FastAPI on AWS, integrated LLM/AI for business reporting and workflows, launched scalable cloud infrastructure, and transitioned a high-growth startup.
highlights: Built distributed event-data pipelines using TypeScript/Node.js and FastAPI on AWS
Integrated LLM/AI capabilities for business reporting and workflow automation
Designed and deployed scalable cloud-native infrastructure supporting rapid growth

experience.title: WordPress & Automation Engineer
experience.summary: Built a modular WordPress plugin and serverless scraper, enhancing LinkedIn post ingestion and marketing automation. Improved scraper reliability to 96% and implemented GitHub Actions CI, reducing release cycle time from days to one business day.
highlights: Developed modular WordPress plugin with serverless scraper for LinkedIn automation
Improved scraper reliability from ~70% to 96% through robust error handling
Implemented GitHub Actions CI/CD, reducing release cycle from days to 1 business day

experience.title: AI & Automation Consultant
experience.summary: Delivered microservices for lead scoring and enrichment, reduced qualification time from 30m to 12m per batch, enforced cost guardrails for LLM, lowering inference spend 28%, and standardized prompt/eval harnesses for smoother internal iterations.
highlights: Built microservices for lead scoring and enrichment, reducing qualification time by 60% (30m->12m)
Implemented LLM cost guardrails, reducing inference spend by 28%
Standardized prompt engineering and evaluation harnesses for faster iterations

experience.title: Digital Transformation Lead
experience.summary: Re-engineered inventory and order sync, merged wholesale/e-commerce data, reclaimed ~10 staff hours/week, built QR-based loyalty MVP, and automated daily sales digest accelerating price adjustments from 48h to same day.
highlights: Re-engineered inventory and order sync systems, saving ~10 staff hours/week
Built QR-based loyalty program MVP and automated daily sales reporting
Accelerated pricing adjustments from 48 hours to same-day through automation

experience.title: E-commerce Funnel Optimization Consultant
experience.summary: Mentored 100+ marketplace sellers, raised conversion rates by 35%, produced A/B-testing playbooks, and delivered KPI scorecards bundled in Taager's Starter Growth Pack.
highlights: Mentored 100+ marketplace sellers, increasing conversion rates by 35%
Developed A/B testing playbooks and KPI scorecards for growth optimization
Delivered growth methodologies bundled in Taager's Starter Growth Pack

experience.title: Independent E-Commerce Engineering
experience.summary: Optimized Shopify/WooCommerce stores, maintained 2.5-3.2x ROAS, automated margin and pricing tools, improved fulfillment SLA, and streamlined price update loop.
highlights: Optimized Shopify/WooCommerce stores maintaining 2.5-3.2x ROAS
Built automated margin and pricing tools for inventory management
Improved fulfillment SLA and streamlined pricing update workflows

experience.title: Co-Founder & Digital Strategist
experience.summary: Led integrated web and performance marketing projects for 15+ SMEs, delivered ~40% revenue growth, and established sprint-based processes now agency SOP.
highlights: Led web development and performance marketing for 15+ SME clients
Delivered ~40% average revenue growth through integrated digital strategies
Established sprint-based processes that became agency standard operating procedures

experience.title: Front-End Developer
experience.summary: Migrated jQuery legacy views to React, improved regression bug rates, implemented code-splitting for performance, boosting TTI from 3.5s to 2.1s on mid-tier devices.
highlights: Migrated legacy jQuery codebase to modern React architecture
Implemented code-splitting and lazy loading for performance optimization
Reduced Time to Interactive (TTI) from 3.5s to 2.1s on mid-tier devices

experience.title: Founder
experience.summary: Prototyped smartphone computer-vision measurement app using OpenCV and Xamarin, delivered +/-1-2 cm variance, and honed rapid iteration and user feedback-driven development.
highlights: Built computer-vision measurement app using OpenCV and Xamarin
Achieved +/-1-2 cm measurement accuracy through CV algorithm optimization
Practiced rapid prototyping and user feedback-driven development cycles
